name: Black Otaku 2: Taekwondo is in my Blood
storyline:
After a near-fatal car accident, Sahara B. Shabazz was in need of a blood transfusion ... and in need of one fast!!!

Fate had decided that on that very same night, a Korean, 7th dan, Taekwondo, black belt, gold medalist had left the windows closed and slept with the fan on after celebrating yet another gold medal.

The next day, he was rushed to the hospital but it was too late to save him and as his last heroic act in life ... he had decided to donate his blood to Sahara B. Shabazz.

Sahara B. Shabazz decided to honour that Korean man's sacrifice by winning this martial arts tournament with the Taekwondo that flows in her veins.
summary: Join Sahara B. Shabazz as she honours that Korean man's sacrifice by winning this martial arts tournament with the Taekwondo that flows in her veins.
